timeline.message:
EQL: Remove wildcard functionality from :

Restrict : operator to only case insensitive matching on strings

Close #63262

timeline.bodyText: Can this be kept around but not actually used?
timeline.author: astefan

replies.bodyText: It can be but considering it worked when dealing with operators and * within a string, unless this scenario applies again this rule will not be needed.
replies.author: costin
